snippet: Studio has bought rights to tell the story of the landmark case that brought recognition of gay nuptials by the Supreme Court
abstract: Twentieth Century Fox announces it has bought life rights of Jim Obergefell, lead plaintiff in case that led to Supreme Court effectively legalizing same-sex marriage throughout the United States, as well as screen rights by still-unwritten book by Obergefell.
lead_paragraph: Studio has bought rights to tell the story of the landmark case that brought recognition of gay nuptials by the Supreme Court

headline.main: Fox Is Planning to Make Movie About Same-Sex Marriage Ruling
headline.print_headline: Fox Is Planning to Make Movie About Historic Marriage Ruling

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
